titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Helen Hayes.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Helen Hayes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend, and the Postal Service to issue, a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Helen Hayes.
